name: Velocimeter FLOW
description: Velocimeter's twin-AMM design unites StableSwap pools with Standard 'kxy' liquidity pools. All the trading fees go to Vote-Escrowers of emission token $FLOW which has to be Locked to earn from candidate pools via Trade Fees bribes and contract secured revenue. Bringing together evm and cosmos ecosystem tokens inside a ve33 dex. Velocimeter, at its core, is a solution for protocols on Canto to properly incentivize liquidity for their own use cases. Building on top of the groundwork laid out by Solidly, our team has addressed that first iteration's core issues to realize its full potential.
